name: Night Fall (LionEY)
description:
Can you protect the ancient lands for the longest time in Night Fall? Defend the door to the ancient lands from endless waves of rouge wizards wishing to destroy it. Let the dark magic help you for every time you die, you become stronger!

How to play:

WASD/Arrows to move

Left click to shoot

Upon dying you can upgrade yourself! however, you can only die when the timer is done

Do not let the enemies reach the door, nor do let it become night or you will lose!
